result.arabic_text: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
result.translation: Bityo, Allah asumba byose, Umwami w’ukuri; nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri uretse We, Nyagasani wa Ar’shi[1] y’icyubahiro.
result.footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iri jambo muri Surat ul A’araf: 54.
